title: FS/FT: Joe Lake NY Hindu SGC 10 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Joe Lake NY Hindu SGC 10 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Good evening!  Have this Joe Lake Hindu available for sale at $SOLD.....tough card even with crayon and small writing but no paper loss.  Great picture on the front.

Will consider trades for EPDGs or HOFers.
